EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us on Opening Night at Space Symposium 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Join Us on Opening Night at Space Symposium 2018
Honeywell Aerospace invites you to join us for complimentary drinks on the opening night of Space Symposium 2018 as we celebrate the kick-off to one of our favorite space industry events. We will host a reception at: Date: April 16, 2018 Time: 7:30 - 9 p.m. Location: Booth #428 Click here <[[https://space18.mapyourshow.com/7_0/floorplan/index.cfm?hallID=D&selectedBooth=booth~428]]> to see our location on the show floor. For more information or to schedule a meeting with Honeywell representatives at Space Symposium, contact Daryl Schuck, customer business manager at daryl.schuck@honeywell.com <[[mailto:daryl.schuck@honeywell.com]]> or 832-205-5990.
Delivering Affordable, Intelligent Solutions: Honeywell has unequalled expertise in developing and manufacturing hardware and systems to meet the high-performance demands of space missions. We are helping to create the next generation of space flight excellence – all with 100% mission success. Discover more here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/markets/space]]>.
Please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> if you like to stay informed about our upcoming events, product and service offerings.
